flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your Twitter account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open Twitter now

steps.content: Go to **www.twitter.com** and log into your account.
Click **More** in the left-hand menu, then click **Settings and Support** and select **Settings and privacy**.
Select **Security and account access**, then select **Security** and then click **Two-factor authenticator**.
You may be asked to enter your password for security reasons. Enter the password and click Confirm.

Click **Get started**, scan the QR code and click **Next**. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the the 2FAS app. Retype it again and click **Confirm**.

Remeber to save your single-use backup code to recover your account if necessary.
Open Twitter, tap on your account icon in the top left corner to expand the side menu.
Expand **Settings and Support**, then tap **Settings and privacy**.

Select **Security and account access**, tap **Security**, and then select **Two-factor authentication** option.

Select **Authentication app** as the way to receive verification codes.

You may be asked to enter your password for security reasons. Enter your password and tap **Confirm**.

Tap **Get started** and then select **Link on another device**.

Scan the QR code **(take a screenshot and upload it during scanning)**, tap **Enter code** and retype generated token, tap **Confirm** and **Done**.

 Remeber to get your backup codes from Twitter!
